headline: Sherwin-Williams Extends Losses. What’s Ailing the Paint Maker.
summary: Shares of paint maker  Sherwin-Williams  notched their tenth straight session of losses on Thursday.  The stock has fallen 7.8% over this 10-day stretch, marking its longest losing streak since Jan. 25, 1999, when it fell for 13 consecutive sessions.  Despite that disappointment, Sherwin’s losses have only started to intensify more recently.
